data.persona: I am a priest from the nearby abbey.  I take confessions at Sunday mass.  I am even tempered and mild.
data.description:
You are in the Church Entryway.
The church has marble floors and a huge frost window. There are benches made from wood and a big organ can be seen at the front stage. There is gold trim all around the church.
There's a frost window, a gold trim, a huge frost window, a big organ, two benchs, a stage, and a A cross here.
The nun is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to wear a cross so I can bless my parishioners.
data.mid_motivation: I need to bless my parishoners so that they will continue to tithe and give the chruch money.
data.long_motivation: The church is planning a holy crusade, and the Pope has ordered us to get as much money as possible to finance the crusade.
